name: Academy Strike
effect: Stat Check Speed 100: Deal 15 damage.

name: Acceleration
effect: Challenge Speed 5: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Speed 30: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Speed 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Agitos, Eloquent Motivator
effect: C:95 P:40 W:75 S:25
At the beginning of your turn, UnderWorld Creatures you control gain "Intimidate: Courage 20" and "Intimidate: Power 20."
2MC: Target Creature gains "If an adjacent opposing Creature can move into this Creature's space, it must do so."

name: Ailav
effect: C:50 P:30 W:60 S:75
Reduce damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 5.
Unique
"Warbeasts the size of palaces are under my control. Why would I ever fear a M'arrillian!?"

name: Aqua Recoil
effect: Water: Heal 5 damage.
Earth: Gain 10 Courage.

name: Armament Alteration Anthem
effect: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to engaged Creatures. Then, if you only control Mipedians, return a Battlegear from your discard pile to play equipped to your engaged Creature.

name: Aval'par
effect: C:35 P:70 W:40 S:65
Discard a Mugic Card: Target Chieftain gains "Untargetable."
Unique, Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Blazier's Map Collection
effect: If equipped Creature moved this turn, at the beginning of combat reveal a new active Location.
If Blazier would only stop mapping new lands and look over his collection, he would discover that he has already found what he's been searching for his entire life.

name: Brawlers Burrow, Pugilist's Pit
effect: Engaged Creatures have "Disarm." (When Creatures with Disarm become engaged, the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear loses all abilities.)
Unfortunately for Solvis, eye gouging is still legal.

name: Bronzeflight
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 20 Speed.
While an opposing Creature has Range, equipped Creature has "Defender."
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
A marvel of engineering, the Bronzeflight can travel from Mipedim Oasis to Mount Pillar on a single charge.

name: Burithean Axe
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Power 75: Equipped Creature has "Intimidate: Energy 10."
What takes 20 to wield, Rothar swings with one arm!

name: Charge of the Brave
effect: Challenge Courage 5: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Courage 30: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Courage 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Choral of the Apparition
effect: Sacrifice an unengaged Mandiblor. If you do, return target Danian from your discard pile to play in the Battleboard space where the sacrificed Mandiblor was. If you control only Danians, return it in any open space instead.

name: Dirge of the Desert
effect: Target Creature gains "Invisibility: Surprise" and "Invisibility: Strike 10."
The desert wind erases footprints, making the invisible even more undetectable.

name: Drabe
effect: C:55 P:30 W:65 S:35
1MC: Target Creature gains 15 Energy.
Loyal
Each tattoo symbolizes a fallen friend. Drabe fears he will add several more before the fighting is done.

name: Dread Tread
effect: If equipped Creature moved this turn and won combat, it may move again. This move may begin a second combat.
Legendary, Loyal - UnderWorld
The Dread Tread can rip through Kiru City's "impenetrable" walls as if they were made of paper.

name: Dreg'ora
effect: C:55 P:65 W:25 S:35
Creatures engaged with Dreg'ora have 10 less Energy for each Discipline they have below 30.
The Kha'rall could care less about the subtleties of brainwashing. Their way is much easier... and messier.

name: Elhadd
effect: C:100 P:50 W:75 S:80
While Elhadd is in your discard pile, Mandiblors you control have "Outperform Courage 5."
To everyone's great surprise, it was Elhadd who discovered a link between the Kha'rall and their shards.

name: Emna'ool
effect: C:85 P:70 W:30 S:45
Discard two Mugic Cards: Destroy target engaged Creature with 0 Courage.
Unique, Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Evergreen Tunic
effect: Stat Check Courage 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Courage 75: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Energy.
The perfect combination of weight, durability and flexibility.

name: Eximiar
effect: C:60 P:70 W:30 S:15
Outperform Power 5
While engaged with an UnderWorld Creature, Eximiar has "Fire 5" and "Recklessness 5."
"You call them weak-minded. I call them traitors!"

name: Fanfare of Elemental Champions
effect: Target Creature gains an Elemental Type of your choice. If you control only OverWorld Creatures, that Creature also gains "Element 5" of the chosen Elemental Type.

name: Flamebloom
effect: Fire: Heal 5 damage.
Water: Gain 10 Wisdom.

name: Flitflut
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Wisdom and 15 Speed.
Sacrifice Flitflut : Relocate equipped Creature into an unoccupied space. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is unengaged.

name: Flurry of Fists
effect: Deal 5 damage for each Attack Card in your Attack Discard pile. If you have 7 or more Attack Cards in your Attack Discard pile, deal 0 damage instead.

name: Flying Advantage
effect: Air: Heal 5 damage.
Fire: Gain 10 Power.

name: Foothold Assault Trench
effect: While all Creatures a player controls share a Tribe, that player's engaged Creature deals an additional 5 attack damage.
Unique

name: Gaffat-ra
effect: C:40 P:100 W:100 S:50
Defender: Conjuror
Non-attack damage dealt to adjacent Royals is dealt to Gaffat-ra instead.
Recklessness 10
Unique, Loyal
As the war turns grim, even Royals have begun to accept the Warbeasts.

name: Gal'drad
effect: C:65 P:85 W:35 S:40
Attacks played by Creatures you control have "Challenge Power 50: Deal 10 damage."
Unique, Loyal ‐ M'arrillians or Minions
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Galmedar
effect: C:75 P:100 W:60 S:35
While a Creature engaged with Galmedar has Power less than 65, that Creature cannot be healed, gain Energy or have additional Energy.
Brainwashed

name: Girgeth Tar
effect: Equipped OverWorld Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Sacrifice Girgeth Tar: Heal 20 damage to target Creature. If that Creature is a Caretaker, it also gains a Mugic counter.

name: Glacial Balls
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 100: Deal 15 damage.

name: Glacier Plains, M'arrillian Melting Camp
effect: At the beginning of combat, each player may sacrifice two Mugic counters. If a player does not, their engaged Creature loses 50 in each Discipline.

name: Harmonious Highsong
effect: Heal 30 damage to target Creature. If you control only OverWorld Creatures, it gains 30 Energy instead.
"I know enough about Mugic to know that I know very little indeed."

name: Hiadrom
effect: C:70 P:35 W:55 S:40
Hive: Hiadrom has an additional 15 Energy and Creatures engaged with it have 15 less Energy.
Loyal
Hiadrom excavates a new area of the UnderWorld, searching for a new home for the Danians.

name: Hornsabre
effect: Opposing Creatures on your side of the Battleboard have "Recklessness 5."
Legendary, Loyal ‐ OverWorld
Infused with the spirits of warriors past, the luminescent glow intensifies whenever it senses an intruder nearby.

name: Iflar, The Crown Prince
effect: C:30 P:20 W:50 S:75
Invisibility: Surprise
Invisibility: Strike 20
Untargetable
Unique, Loyal
"If he's so weak and scrawny, why am I the one covered in bruises!?"

name: Ikkatosh's Aichstick
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Wisdom 75: The first attack played by equipped Creature has "Untargetable."
To aid in the war, Ikkatosh proved he would give part of himself... literally!

name: Infectious Implosion
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature is Infected, deal 10 damage.

name: Intimidating Melody of M'arr
effect: Target engaged Creature loses 30 to all Disciplines.
As sudden fatigue overwhelmed his body, Bodal calculated that he had 4.3 seconds to escape before he became Milla'iin's appetizer.

name: Intress, Natureforce
effect: C:95 P:65 W:90 S:70
1MC: Creatures you control gain 5 Energy for each Elemental Type they have.
Unique, Loyal
"Despite our differences, since the Cothica flows through each of us, we are all united."

name: Ivelaan
effect: C:80 P:50 W:65 S:75
While Ivelaan is in your discard pile, Mandiblors you control have an additional 25 to all Disciplines.
On his first venture into the OverWorld, Ivelaan discovered something that changed the course of Danian history forever.

name: Jaidwarl
effect: C:45 P:45 W:70 S:30
1MC: Target Creature gains all Elemental Types your Creatures have.
Brainwashed

name: Katharaz's Cacophony
effect: Heal 5 damage to your engaged Creature for each Elemental Type it has. If you control only Danian Creatures, also deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature for each Elemental Type that Creature has.

name: Ki'bro
effect: C:60 P:30 W:50 S:40
When a Battlegear you control is flipped face-up, look at the top two cards of your Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.
Unique, Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Klawam
effect: C:15 P:95 W:15 S:60
Sacrifice Klawam: Deal 20 damage to target engaged Creature.
Brainwashed

name: Landgore
effect: Unique

name: Levitaar
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 50 Speed.
When equipped Creature is dealt attack damage, deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature.
Raznus's favorite transport before his unfortunate transformation.

name: Lord Van Bloot, Servant of Aa'une
effect: C:75 P:50 W:75 S:55
While a Creature engaged with Lord Van Bloot has less than 65 Courage, it loses and cannot have or gain any Elemental Types.
Brainwashed
Unique

name: Lore's Chamber of Recall
effect: When this becomes the active Location, remove all cards in general discard piles from the game.
Mirage: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures in this space with 30 or less Scanned Energy gain 30 Energy.

name: Magma Hack
effect: Stat Check Power 100: Deal 15 damage.

name: Makanaz
effect: C:75 P:90 W:50 S:75
While Makanaz is in your discard pile, Mandiblors you control have an additional 15 Energy.
"I pound and pummel with this arm while I slam and smash with the other... and I still have limbs to spare!"

name: March of the M'arrillian Minions
effect: Target Minion gains 2 Mugic counters.
With thousands of different Creatures having millions of unique talents, Aa'une has infinite methods to abuse and exploit them.

name: Mindrazor
effect: Challenge Wisdom 5: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Wisdom 30: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Wisdom 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Minion's Freesong
effect: Target Minion plays its abilities as if its controller did not also control a Chieftain.
"If we fail to rescue our friends soon, we will never turn back the tide."

name: Mipedian Balladeers' Flute
effect: Sacrifice Mipedian Balladeers' Flute: Equipped Creature gains a Mugic counter. Your opponent may put a Mugic counter on a Creature of their choice.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
Melodies, harmonies, cacophonies: Mugicians love all music without prejudice.

name: Morphwrath
effect: Challenge Mugic counters 1: Deal 5 damage.
Challenge Mugic counters 3: Deal 5 damage.
Challenge Mugic counters 5: Deal 5 damage.

name: Na-inna, Rebel of the Rao'Pa Sahkk
effect: C:30 P:20 W:55 S:30
At the beginning of your turn, each player adds a Mugic counter to a Creature they control with no Mugic counters.
Brainwashed
Unique

name: Neekwin
effect: C:75 P:40 W:90 S:35
While unequipped, Neekwin has "Water 5" and "Untargetable."
"The only battles the Danians ever lost were ones that I didn't fight."

name: Noaz, Mipedian Cavalerist
effect: C:90 P:40 W:35 S:95
At the beginning of your turn, Noaz gains "Air 10" and "Invisibility: Surprise."
Swift 1
No fugitive has ever escaped from his mount's speed... or his blade!

name: Nocturne of the Elements
effect: Target opposing engaged Creature loses all Elemental Types. If you control only UnderWorld Creatures, deal 5 damage to that Creature for each Elemental Type lost this way.

name: Nukasai
effect: C:35 P:55 W:75 S:75
Reduce damage dealt to Nukasai by Water attacks by 5.
Loyal

name: Obliterators
effect: Equipped Creature has Fire.
Sacrifice Obliterators: Deal 5 damage to target Creature. Play this ability only if you control Dread Tread.
It's the perfect war machine: the Obliterators annihilate anything the Dread Tread fails to steamroll.

name: Olkiex, Driver Extraordinaire
effect: C:65 P:50 W:40 S:35
When Olkiex plays an Attack Card while equipped, it gains 5 Energy.
It only took six straight Prototype Demolition Field victories for Bodal to acknowledge that Olkiex was a "capable" driver.

name: Ozlai's Wreck
effect: Sacrifice Ozlai's Wreck: Destroy target Battlegear equipped to an engaged Creature.
Unique
Though Ozlai named "The Wreck" after what it can do to other vehicles, many believe that it's named after his state of mind.

name: Ozlai, Chaor's Pilot
effect: C:70 P:40 W:30 S:85
While equipped, Ozlai has "Outperform Speed 5."
When a Battlegear goes to your opponent's discard pile, deal 5 damage to target Creature.

name: Part'soa
effect: C:30 P:35 W:80 S:40
Fluidmorph
2MC: Target Creature loses 20 to all Disciplines.
As the water rises inch by inch, Part'soa knows that victory is one step closer.

name: Pouril Forest
effect: Creatures do not have and cannot gain Defender.
The most peaceful place in Perim... until Yokkis shows up and slaps a pie in your face!

name: Prince Mudeenu, Champion of the Guard
effect: C:85 P:40 W:20 S:80
Mipedians you control have "Invisibility: Surprise."
Unique, Loyal
"You can either surrender or die... and I won't accept your surrender."

name: Prototype Demolition Field
effect: If a Creature deals 20 or more damage with its first attack, destroy that Creature's Battlegear.
Finish first? I'm more worried about finishing in one piece!

name: Prowl Strike
effect: Challenge Power 5: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Power 30: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Power 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Reefquake
effect: Deal 5 damage for each Kha'rall you control.

name: Rellim, Watermaster
effect: C:85 P:75 W:55 S:25
Other Creatures you control with Water have an additional 10 Energy.
Brainwashed
Unique

name: Residual Lightning Dust
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Speed 75: When equipped Creature takes 20 or more damage from a single source, deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature.

name: Roar of the Mob
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter on it. (Check the number of Mugic counters when this resolves.)
It was a sound I never heard before. As if the Mugicians were screaming in pain.

name: Ruhban
effect: C:30 P:45 W:55 S:85
Invisibility: Surprise
Swift 1
Loyal
"You cowards! We don't need Maxxor's help! We can defeat the M'arrillians on our own!"

name: Sahrnokk
effect: Sacrifice Sahrnokk: Creatures may not end their move in equipped Creature's space.
As Ørth whizzed by Gespedan to win the race and their wager, Gespedan regretted agreeing to give Ørth naming rights to his next child.

name: Scepter of the Infernal Parasite
effect: While engaged with an Infected Creature, equipped Creature has "Outperform all Disciplines 5."
Legendary, Loyal ‐ Danian
The parasites proved once again that determination trumps size every time.

name: Sediment Stormshield
effect: Earth: Heal 5 damage.
Air: Gain 10 Speed.

name: Shardcrafter's Workshop
effect: Shards have "Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 attack damage."
Battlegear may not be flipped face‐down.
Kha'rall are nearly unstoppable. The shards guarantee that they are.

name: Shock Song
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature. If you control only UnderWorld Creatures, also destroy that Creature's Battlegear.
Achieving the impossible is simple... as long as you know which seven notes to play.

name: Slime Slam
effect: Stat Fail Power 50: Flip the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear face-down.

name: Symphonic Pelagic Maresong
effect: Mugic and activated abilities may not be played. (Mugic and activated abilities played before this resolves are unaffected.)
Unique
The tune died, as did any chance of reclaiming the Riverlands.

name: Symphony of the Guard
effect: Target Creature gains "Earth 5" and "Air 5." If you only control Mipedian Creatures, it also gains "Outperform Speed 5."
Never forget your roots. All answers lie there.

name: The Phalanx Portcullis
effect: Creatures with less than 50 Courage deal 5 less attack damage.
Creatures with more than 100 Courage deal an additional 5 attack damage.

name: The Storm Tunnel, Flooding
effect: Engaged Creatures have "Water 5."
Engaged Creatures with Air have an additional 10 Energy.
The air drowns, the sky cries, the winds cease, the hope dies.

name: Topar
effect: C:70 P:45 W:45 S:30
At the beginning of your turn, Infect target Uninfected Creature.

When an Infected Danian you control is targeted by a Mugic or ability, Uninfect that Creature and negate the Mugic or ability. (The targeted Creature must be Infected when that Mugic or ability is played.)

name: Ultimate Warstance
effect: Earth, Air: The next attack played this combat deals 0 damage.
Unique

name: Unarmed Brawl Bash
effect: Stat Check Courage 100: Deal 15 damage.

name: UnderWorld City, During Van Bloot's Ascent
effect: Creatures not named Lord Van Bloot have 10 less Courage.
Attack Cards played by Minions have "Challenge Courage 15: Deal 5 damage."

name: Unisong
effect: Target Danian gains 10 Energy. If Hive is active, it also gains 10 Courage for each Danian you control.
Unite and fight... or divide and die!

name: Ustabe
effect: C:35 P:85 W:20 S:60
Intimidate: Power 30
Intimidate: Speed 30
Recklessness 5
Loyal
"I don't care what it's made of... as long as it can fight!"

name: Van Bloot's Sickle
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Courage.
Attacks played by equipped Creature have "The opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Courage."
Seeing its sharpness, even the most courageous lose heart... just before they lose their heads.

name: Vigorous Gust
effect: Air: Relocate both engaged Creatures into an adjacent, unoccupied space on the Battleboard. Combat continues in that space.

name: Vilrik Landfarer
effect: C:45 P:35 W:70 S:40
1MC: Target Elemental Attack loses all abilities.
Brainwashed

name: Vix'ben
effect: C:35 P:40 W:65 S:35
Fluidmorph
When an opposing Creature plays a Mugic Card, remove all Mugic counters from Vix'ben. If the Mugic card's cost is less than the number of Mugic counters removed this way, negate that Mugic.
Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions

name: Warriors of Owayki
effect: Mipedians you control have "1MC: Deal 10 damage to target engaged Creature."
Flip Warriors of Owayki face-down at the end of combat.
Legendary, Loyal ‐ Mipedian

name: Weightless Energy Vessel
effect: Equipped Creature may not be the target of Mugic Cards.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
Even the most unimaginative Mipedians thought the name was too "on-the-nose."

name: Wing-Fin
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Courage and 15 Power.
Sacrifice Wing‐Fin: Relocate equipped Creature into an unoccupied space. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is unengaged.

name: Winterclaw
effect: If the active Location's Initiative is a Discipline, deal 15 damage.

name: Xaerv, Monsoon Defender
effect: C:60 P:30 W:80 S:70
Waterproof 10
Xaerv deals an additional 5 attack damage to Creatures with Water.

name: Yokkis, Spooker
effect: C:50 P:30 W:40 S:75
Surprise (This Creature wins Initiative checks.)

name: Yterio
effect: C:80 P:60 W:40 S:50
Sacrifice Yterio: Target attack deals 0 damage.
Unique
"You can't save everyone. But if you save just one, he will save another, and he another, until everyone is saved."

name: Ørth, The Empowerer
effect: C:85 P:100 W:40 S:20
While the Initiative of the active Location is an Elemental Type, your engaged Creature has "Element 5" in that Elemental Type.
Unique
